name: n8n-nodes-base.amqp
description: Sends a raw-message via AMQP 1.0, executed once per item

properties.name: sink
properties.description: Name of the queue of topic to publish to

properties.name: headerParametersJson
properties.description: Header parameters as JSON (flat object). Sent as application_properties in amqp-message meta info.

options.name: containerId
options.description: Will be used to pass to the RHEA Backend as container_id

options.name: dataAsObject
options.description: Whether to send the data as an object

options.name: reconnect
options.description: Whether to automatically reconnect if disconnected

options.name: sendOnlyProperty
options.description: The only property to send. If empty the whole item will be sent.
